dump_fields.f90

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 ! ======================
00002 !
00003 !   DUMP_FIELDS
00004 !
00005 !   Write out field data for 
00006 !     postprocessing
00007 
00008 !
00009 !
00010 ! ======================
00011 
00012 subroutine dump_fields(timestamp)
00013 
00014 
00015   use physvars
00016 !  use treevars
00017   implicit none 
00018   include 'mpif.h'
00019 
00020   real, dimension(ngx) :: work1, work2
00021   real, dimension(ngx) :: phi_pond, ex_pond, ey_pond, ez_pond
00022   real, dimension(0:ngx+1) :: rhoi_slice, rhoe_slice, ex_slice, ey_slice, ez_slice
00023   real, dimension(0:ngx+1) :: jxe_slice, jye_slice, jze_slice 
00024   real, dimension(0:ngx+1,0:ngy+1,0:ngz+1) :: exg, eyg, ezg, jxeg, jyeg, jzeg
00025 
00026   real :: dx, dz, dy, xd, yd, zd, dummy, simtime, epon_x, epon_y, epon_z, phipond, epond_max, box_max
00027   real :: Qtot, Qbox, norm, rhonorm, tpon, bx_em, by_em, az_em,ez_em
00028 
00029   character(30) :: cfile
00030   character(5) :: cme
00031   character(6) :: cdump, cvis
00032   integer, intent(in) :: timestamp
00033   integer :: i, j, k, ioffset, idummy=0, ilev, ixd, iyd, izd, npx, npz, npy
00034   integer :: icall, lcount, ierr
00035   integer :: jfoc, kfoc, ng, nave
00036 
00037   icall = timestamp/ivis
00038   simtime = timestamp*dt
00039 
00040   ! Gather locally accumulated averages
00041   ng = (ngx+2)*(ngy+2)*(ngz+2)                         ! total # gridpoints
00042 
00043   call MPI_ALLREDUCE(rhoe_loc, rhoe, ng, MPI_REAL, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr)
00044   call MPI_ALLREDUCE(rhoi_loc, rhoi, ng, MPI_REAL, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr)
00045   call MPI_ALLREDUCE(jxe_loc, jxeg, ng, MPI_REAL, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr)
00046   call MPI_ALLREDUCE(jye_loc, jyeg, ng, MPI_REAL, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr)
00047   call MPI_ALLREDUCE(jze_loc, jzeg, ng, MPI_REAL, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr)
00048   call MPI_ALLREDUCE(ex_loc, exg, ng, MPI_REAL, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr)
00049   call MPI_ALLREDUCE(ey_loc, eyg, ng, MPI_REAL, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr)
00050   call MPI_ALLREDUCE(ez_loc, ezg, ng, MPI_REAL, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr)
00051 
00052   ! get filename suffix from dump counter
00053   do i=0,4
00054      cdump(6-i:6-i) =  achar(mod(timestamp/10**i,10) + 48)  
00055   end do
00056   cdump(1:1) = achar(timestamp/10**5 + 48)
00057 
00058   if (my_rank==0) then
00059      write(*,'(//a/a,f10.1,a1,f10.1,a1,f10.1)') 'Cycle-average field dump:', &
00060           'writing out densities, fields on grid ',xl,'*',yl,'*',zl
00061      ! dump electron and ion densities, electron currents, DC fields within xl*yl*zl
00062      cfile = "fields/"//cdump//".xyz"
00063      open (62,file=cfile)
00064      cfile = "fields/laser_"//cdump//".xyz"
00065      open (63,file=cfile)
00066      dx = xl/ngx
00067      dy = yl/ngy
00068      dz = zl/ngz
00069      Qbox = 0.
00070      do k=1,ngz
00071         do j=1,ngy
00072            do i=1,ngx
00073               Qbox = Qbox + rhoe(i,j,k)*dx*dy*dz
00074               write(62,'(8e13.3)') rhoe(i,j,k)/omega**2,rhoi(i,j,k)/omega**2, &
00075                    jxeg(i,j,k), jyeg(i,j,k), jzeg(i,j,k), &
00076                    exg(i,j,k),  eyg(i,j,k), ezg(i,j,k)
00077 !              xd = (i-0.5)*dx - 20.-focus(1) ! position relative to laser focus
00078               xd = (i-0.5)*dx - focus(1) ! position relative to laser focus
00079               yd = (j-0.5)*dy - focus(2)
00080               zd = (k-0.5)*dz - focus(3)
00081 
00082               laser: select case(beam_config)
00083 
00084               case(4)
00085                  call fpond( 1.57/omega, tpulse,sigma,vosc,omega, rho_upper, &
00086                       xd,yd,zd,epon_x,epon_y,epon_z,phipond)
00087                  Tpon = min(1.,tlaser/tpulse) * (sin(omega*tlaser))**2
00088                  !                 mvis(lcount) = epon_x/omega ! Pond field, EM norm
00089 
00090               case(5)  ! propagating fpond
00091                  call laser_bullet( tlaser, focus(1), tpulse,sigma,vosc,omega, &
00092                       xd,yd,zd,epon_x,epon_y,epon_z,phipond)
00093 
00094               case(24) ! Standing wave fpond Ez, By, Az
00095                  call emobliq(tlaser,tpulse,sigma,vosc,omega,theta_inc, &
00096                       xd,yd,zd,epon_x,epon_y,epon_z,phipond)
00097 
00098               case(6) ! Plane wave
00099                  call emplane(tlaser,tpulse,sigma,vosc,omega,xd,yd,zd,ez_em,by_em,bx_em,az_em,phipond)
00100 
00101               case default ! Propagating fpond
00102                  phipond = 0  
00103 
00104               end select laser
00105               write(63,'(4e13.3)') phipond,epon_x,epon_y,epon_z
00106            end do
00107         end do
00108      end do
00109      Qtot = SUM(rhoe)*dx*dy*dz  ! including ghost cells
00110      write(ifile_cpu,'(4(a,f14.5/))') &
00111           'Total charge on grid:',Qbox, &
00112           '         ghost cells:',Qtot-Qbox, &
00113           '                 sum:',Qtot, &
00114           'Initial charge Q_s*Ne = rho0*Vplas = ',Vplas*rho0
00115      write(*,'(4(a,f14.5/))') &
00116           'Total charge on grid:',Qbox, &
00117           '         ghost cells:',Qtot-Qbox, &
00118           '                 sum:',Qtot, &
00119           'Initial charge Q_s*Ne = rho0*Vplas = ',Vplas*rho0
00120 
00121      close(62)
00122      close(63)
00123 
00124 
00125      ! x-slices along laser axis
00126      jfoc = focus(2)/dy
00127      kfoc = focus(3)/dz
00128 
00129      ! density average line-out along laser axis: nave*nave average, converted to n/nc
00130 
00131      rhoe_slice = 0.
00132      rhoi_slice = 0.
00133      ex_slice = 0.
00134      jxe_slice = 0.
00135 
00136      if (ngz<=5) then
00137         nave=0
00138      else
00139         nave = min(3,ngz/2)
00140      endif
00141 
00142      norm = (2*nave+1)**2
00143      rhonorm = norm*omega**2
00144 
00145      do k=kfoc-nave,kfoc+nave
00146         do j=jfoc-nave,jfoc+nave
00147 
00148            rhoe_slice(1:ngx) = rhoe_slice(1:ngx)+rhoe(1:ngx,j,k)/norm  ! density slice along laser axis: 5x5 average
00149            rhoi_slice(1:ngx) = rhoi_slice(1:ngx)+rhoi(1:ngx,j,k)/norm
00150            ex_slice(1:ngx) = ex_slice(1:ngx)+exg(1:ngx,j,k)/norm
00151            jxe_slice(1:ngx) = jxe_slice(1:ngx)+jxeg(1:ngx,j,k)/norm
00152 
00153         end do
00154      end do
00155 
00156      ! Laser fields on axis
00157      do i=1,ngx
00158         xd=i*dx-focus(1)
00159         !        yd=sigma/2.
00160         !        zd=sigma/2.
00161         yd = 0.
00162         zd = 0.
00163         call fpond( 1.57/omega,1.0,sigma,vosc,omega,rho_upper,xd,yd,zd,ex_pond(i),ey_pond(i), &
00164              ez_pond(i), phi_pond(i))
00165      end do
00166      ! Renormalise to EM units
00167      cfile = "fields/xslice."//cdump
00168      open (62,file=cfile)
00169      write(62,'((9(1pe12.4)))') &
00170           (i*dx+x_offset,rhoe_slice(i)/omega**2, rhoi_slice(i)/omega**2, ex_slice(i)/omega,&
00171           jxe_slice(i), phi_pond(i),ex_pond(i)/omega, ey_pond(i)/omega, ez_pond(i)/omega,i=1,ngx)
00172      close(62)
00173 
00174 ! Write out time-averaged E-field profiles to file
00175 ! this has to go in dump_fields once time-averages taken
00176      write(*,'(a40,a10)') 'Cycle-averaged lineouts at',cdump
00177      dx = (xl-x_offset)/ngx ! spacing for time-ave grid
00178      cfile = "fields/linave."//cdump
00179      open (60,file=cfile)
00180      write(60,'(2(a12))') '!   x      ',' ex  '
00181      write(60,'((2(1pe12.4)))') &
00182           (i*dx+x_offset, ex_ave(i), i=0,ngx)
00183      close(60)
00184 
00185   endif
00186   icall = icall + 1
00187 
00188   ! Rezero local fields
00189   rhoe_loc = 0.
00190 
00191   ex_ave = 0.
00192   ex_loc = 0.
00193   ey_loc = 0.
00194   ez_loc = 0.
00195   jxe_loc = 0.
00196   jye_loc = 0.
00197   jze_loc = 0.
00198 
00199 
00200 end subroutine dump_fields
